org.sopra.api

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSunEnergyBroker

    public interface Game
    A game contains the phases that are executed on a scenario. First, the build phase is executed. After the build phase, the execution phase begins. The execution phase itself consists of rounds. Each round, the wind and the energy consumption change depending on the time of the day. To react on these fluctuations, commands can be executed to regulate controllable power plants and consumers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildPhase(Scenario scenario)
      This phase is called before the scenario is started.
      void executionPhase(Scenario scenario, int round)
      This method is called for each round of the execution phase.

    • Method Detail

      • buildPhase

        void buildPhase(Scenario scenario)
        This phase is called before the scenario is started. During this phase, power lines can be upgraded and power plants can be built on transformer station locations.
        Parameters:
        scenario - The scenario of the game.

      • executionPhase

        void executionPhase(Scenario scenario,
                    int round)
        This method is called for each round of the execution phase. In each round, the non-controllable energy nodes change their input or output of energy. This can be a random change or one that depends on the round number. During each round commands can be executed to regulate controllable energy nodes.
        Parameters:
        scenario - The scenario of the game.
        round - The number of the round.
